metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31873 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in klibc before 2.0.9. Additions in the malloc() function may result in an integer overflow and a subsequent heap buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-31873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

klibc-utils - 2.0.8-6.1ubuntu2
libklibc - 2.0.8-6.1ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> only used in initramfs, doesn't parse untrusted data

criterions.comment: klibc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.8-6.1ubuntu2').
